title: Child's dress

Technique: mordant painted and immersion dyed plain weave (chintz)
description: Dress, open down the back for an infant in arms. Pattern of delicate floral sprays in blue, red, lavender, and brown on white. The dress is an example of thrift for the fabric had been used earlier in another format. Faded and worn.
